'''Realm of Snaring Illusions''' is a [[Quest Domain]] during {{Quest|End of the Line (Quest)}}.

==Chests==
* Common Chest ×1
* Precious Chest ×1

==Walkthrough==
There are 5 nodes on the compass, which corresponds to 5 different areas. Rotating the needle to a specific node allows access to the corresponding area through the gate.

Clearing the domain essentially clears the quest. See the steps in [[End of the Line (Quest)|End of the Line]] quest for the walkthrough.

===Enemies===
;Area 1
* Wave 1 {{Enemy List|Treasure Hoarders: Scout*2;Treasure Hoarders: Crusher}}
* Wave 2 {{Enemy List|Treasure Hoarders: Handyman*2;Treasure Hoarders: Scout}}
;Area 2
* Wave 1 {{Enemy List|Fatui Skirmisher - Pyroslinger Bracer;Fatui Skirmisher - Cryogunner Legionnaire}}
* Wave 2 {{Enemy List|Fatui Pyro Agent*1}}

==Dialogue==
See [[End of the Line (Quest)#Dialogue|End of the Line]] for the dialogue in this domain.
